thread.title: BRIEF-American Express Reports Preliminary Card Member Loans Stats For March

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American Express Reports Preliminary Card Member Loans Stats For March
text:
April 16, 2018 / 4:11 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-American Express Reports Preliminary Card Member Loans Stats For March Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - American Express Co: 
* AMERICAN EXPRESS - PRELIMINARY USCS CARD MEMBER LOANS 30 DAYS PAST DUE LOANS AS A % OF TOTAL 1.4 PERCENT AT MARCH END VERSUS 1.4 PERCENT AT FEB 
* AMERICAN EXPRESS -PRELIMINARY U.S. SMALL BUSINESS CARD MEMBER LOANS 30 DAYS PAST DUE LOANS AS A % OF TOTAL 1.3 PERCENT AT MARCH END VERSUS 1.4 PERCENT AT FEB END 
* AMERICAN EXPRESS - PRELIMINARY USCS CARD MEMBER LOANS NET WRITE-OFF RATE-PRINCIPAL ONLY 2.2 PERCENT AT MARCH END VERSUS 2.2 PERCENT AT FEB END 
* AMERICAN EXPRESS - PRELIMINARY U.S. SMALL BUSINESS CARD MEMBER LOANS NET WRITE-OFF RATE â€“ PRINCIPAL ONLY 1.8 PERCENT AT MARCH END VERSUS 1.7 PERCENT AT FEB END Source text: ( bit.ly/2H6Da8f ) Further company coverage:
